title: Wafrow. Evolving landing pages
description:
Small firms operating in multiple languages struggle to write great copy in all languages. Wafrow is an AI copywriter + AB testing tool fluent in english, Deutsch, العربية, français, español and Nederlands. 

Works with all landing page CMS and operates blazing fast. Please give it a spin and share your feedback. 10% discount with code: HUNT and 14 day free trial.
